title: Can We Help Our Listener Get Of Out The Friend Zone?
description:
A while back our listener started crushing on a guy who lived in her building. The two instantly connected and hooked up multiple times. But he started freaking out and backed off.
Now she's currently in the friend zone, but she wants more from him. What does she do?
